channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: We Put Air Conditioners to the Test, and These Are Our 7 Favorites
item.description: These WIRED-tested AC units have been lodged into our windows and cooling our homes for months, if not years.

item.title: Paris-based VC Breega hits first close of $75M Africa fund to back pre-seed and seed startups

item.title: Potatoes Are the Perfect Vegetable—but You’re Eating Them Wrong
